## utils.string.startsWith() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use built-in \*\*string.startsWith\*\* instead.
> 

Fast prefix-checker. Copied from Closure's goog.string.startsWith.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function startsWith(str: string, prefix: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | The string to check. |
|  prefix | string | A string to look for at the start of <code>str</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if `str` begins with `prefix`<!-- -->.
